mdRecord.dcterms:title: Portraits and authograph signatures of the framers and signers of the Declaration of Independence, Philadelphia, July 4th 1776
Declaration centennial 1776 1876
Portraits and autograph signatures of the framers and signers of the Declaration of Independence
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Albert H. Small Declaration of Independence Collection (University of Virginia)
Centennial Portrait and Authograph Co.
Hobart, John Henry Jr, 1775-1830
Hunter, Thomas, approximately 1828-approximately 1894
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Published by the Centennial Portrait and Authograph Co., Philada.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Individual cameo portraits and facsimile signatures of 50 of the signers of the Declaration, with another 7 signers representated by facsimile signature only. "Declaration 1776" appears in a circle at the upper left; "Centennial 1876" on the right. With insets of the Liberty Bell, the "State House in 1876," a military emblem and "Carpenters Hall, where the first Congress met."
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Removed from acidic mounts. Albert H. Small Deposit, June, 2004.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: United States.--Declaration of Independence--Signers--Portraits
